channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How California Is Ignoring Mahmoud v. Taylor
item.description: California public schools are not going to stop indoctrinating kids with LGBTQ-related principles.

item.title: Ethereum brushes record high after Fed Chair says ‘balance of risks’ is shifting
item.description: Investors interpreted Jerome Powell’s remarks as evidence for September rate cuts.

item.title: Trump says he'll keep extending TikTok shutdown deadline
item.description: President Trump is calling national security and privacy concerns related to TikTok and its Chinese parent company "highly overrated" and said Friday ...

item.title: America’s original sanctuary state rebukes Bondi’s warning, denies ‘obstruction’ of ICE
item.description: Tina Kotek cites Anticommandeering Rule and voter support in response to attorney general's enforcement concerns.

item.title: ‘No One Is Above The Law’: FBI Raids Home Of Former National Security Advisor John Bolton
item.description: The FBI raided the D.C.-area home of former Trump National Security Advisor John Bolton on Friday. According to the New York Post’s Caitlin Doornbos, ...

item.title: RNC elects Joe Gruters as next chairman
item.description: The Republican National Committee elected Trump ally and Florida state Sen. Joe Gruters to serve as next chair of the party.

item.title: Cracker Barrel’s first rebrand in nearly 50 years backfired. The company’s stock lost nearly $100 million after introducing a more minimalist look
item.description: The restaurant chain has gotten heat, accused of going too woke.

item.title: Trump DOJ Has FBI Search John Bolton’s Home
item.description: The president is still playing with fire.

item.title: Winter is coming: U.S. will be most vulnerable to a recession late this year and early next as tariff and immigration fallout peak, top economist says
item.description: With the economy facing many threats, it wouldn’t take much to push it into recession, Mark Zandi warns.

item.title: DeSantis fires back after Dem decries Florida's move to ditch LGBT rainbow colors from crosswalk in Orlando

item.title: Abrego Garcia released from jail, will return to Maryland to await trial
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was released from custody in Tennesee and is set to return to his home in Maryland, but his legal proceedings are far from over.

item.title: Canada withdraws retaliatory tariffs on U.S. goods to facilitate trade talks

item.title: It’s Past Time for Congress to Insist upon Enforcement of Its TikTok Law
item.description: The law is clear, and the president is defying it. ByteDance must sell TikTok.

item.title: Fulton County Dems Say No One Can Be Forced To Vote — While Forcing GOP To Rubber-Stamp Elections
item.description: 'No one should force an elected official or any voter to cast a particular vote,' Democrat Mo Ivory said.

item.title: No, America Should Not Take Ukraine as Its Permanent Dependent
item.description: Not even to end the war.

item.title: Justice Jackson Writes Opinions For Her Media Fanbase, Not Everyday Americans
item.description: The more ill-informed and incoherent Jackson's opinions get, the more fawning coverage the media provides her.

item.title: Protester compares Earle-Sears' bathroom stand to Jim Crow water fountains

item.title: Why does an independent Fed matter? Just look at Ronald Reagan’s economy with Paul Volcker hiking rates to nearly 20%
item.description: Independent central banks can more easily take unpopular steps to fight inflation, such as raise interest rates, which makes borrowing more expensive.

item.title: Canva’s billionaire founders are minting overnight millionaires with employee share sale
item.description: Past and present “Canvanauts” will be able to sell up to $3 million of their vested equity, an internal email says.

item.title: The Way Forward for Ukraine After Alaska
item.description: Congress must pass the Russian sanctions bill to give President Trump the hammer he needs to bring a long-term end to this bloody conflict.
